title: Provincial Ombudsman Sindhâ€™s Advisor to Hold Open Court in Sukkur
content:
SUKKUR, Oct 21 (APP):Advisor to the Provincial Ombudsman Sindh, Syed Ali Mumtaz Zaidi will hold an open court on October 22, 2025, at 10:00 am at Circuit House Sukkur.

During the session, he will review public grievances, issues, and matters related to government institutions, and hold direct meetings with the public.

Government officials will also be consulted during the open court to ensure immediate resolution of issues.

All relevant department officials have been advised to attend or nominate a representative to participate in the open court and cooperate in resolving public grievances.
